channel.title: Prototype on Purpurax
channel.description: Recent content in Prototype on Purpurax

item.title: Smoothie
item.description: This is my experience trying to create smoothies myself instead of browsing recipies on the internet. Why did I try to create new smoothies fully from scratch? Everyones taste is different and therefore not all smoothies can be seen as tasty by all. There is no perfect combination of healthy fruits, that everyone will like, but this is not my goal. My goal is to create smoothies that I like and that I find tasty.

item.title: Snappy
item.description: Description What is Snappy? Snappy was created during the Covid pandemic to make wearing a mask a more elegant solution. The normal approach in the pandemic was to take a mask everywhere you go and anytime someone comes close or you enter a building, you had to pop on your mask. This has two major problems: you could forget your mask at home and you need two free hands to place it over your nose.
